summary: This bill, the Lifespan Respite Care Reauthorization Act of 2025 (H.R. 2560), amends the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize lifespan respite care programs. It redefines "family caregiver" and provides funding for the years 2025 through 2029. The bill was introduced in the House of Representatives by Mr. Langworthy and Ms. Tokuda and referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce.
